title: Business Jargon
description: Common business terms and buzzwords and their meanings

questions.question: In business, what does 'synergy' mean?
options: The combined effect being greater than the sum of individual efforts

questions.question: What does it mean to 'pivot' in a business context?
options: To fundamentally change business strategy or direction

questions.question: When someone says 'let's take this offline,' what do they mean?
options: Discuss this privately or at another time

questions.question: What does 'bandwidth' mean in business jargon?
options: The capacity or time available to handle tasks

questions.question: What is a 'stakeholder' in business?
options: Anyone with an interest or concern in the business

questions.question: What does 'think outside the box' mean?
What does 'scalable' mean in business?
options: Able to grow and handle increased demand

questions.question: What is 'due diligence'?
options: Thorough research and investigation before a decision

questions.question: What does 'low-hanging fruit' refer to in business?
options: Easy tasks or goals that can be achieved quickly

questions.question: What does it mean to 'leverage' something in business?
options: To use something to maximum advantage

questions.question: What is a 'pain point' in business?
options: A specific problem that customers or businesses experience

questions.question: What does 'touch base' mean in business?
options: Briefly make contact or check in with someone

questions.question: What does 'bottom line' refer to in business?
options: The final financial result or most important point
The last line of a document
